comment: She is really good. She helps you whenever you need her . And her weekly writing are the easier to do compared to some AP English classes in high school.

Did a 50/50 class, she gave us two absences before she took points off but it did not count much towards the grade. A worksheet, discussion post, and short essay once a week and a research paper/project throughout the semester but it is very straightforward. She doesn't bury things in the syllabus and act arrogant like other professors would.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is super chill and gives every paper a A as long as you do it. She's a great professor and I would recommend this class.
